00017 package WeBWorK::Utils::DelayedMailer;
00018 
00019 use strict;
00020 use warnings;
00021 use Carp;
00022 use Mail::Sender;
00023 use Storable qw/dclone/;
00024 use WeBWorK::Utils qw/constituency_hash/;
00025 
00026 use constant SAFE_MAILMSG_PARAMS => qw/fake_from to fake_to cc fake_cc bcc subject msg/;
00027 
00028 sub new {
00029     my ($invocant, %options) = @_;
00030     my $class = ref $invocant || $invocant;
00031     my $self = bless {}, $class;
00032     
00033     # messages get queued here. format: hashref, safe arguments to MailMsg
00034     $$self{msgs} = [];
00035     
00036     # options to pass to Mail::Sender::new
00037     $$self{new_opts} = $options{new_opts};
00038     
00039     # recipients are checked against this list before sending
00040     # these should be bare rfc822 addresses, not "Name <email@addr>"
00041     $$self{allowed_recipients} = constituency_hash(@{$options{allowed_recipients}});
00042     
00043     # what to do if an illegal recipient is specified
00044     # "croak" (default), "carp", or "ignore"
00045     $$self{on_illegal_rcpt} = $options{on_illegal_rcpt};
00046     
00047     # what to do if an unsafe argument is passed to add_message
00048     # "croak" (default), "carp", or "ignore"
00049     $$self{on_unsafe_arg} = $options{on_unsafe_arg};
00050     
00051     return $self;
00052 }
00053 
00054 sub add_message {
00055     my ($self, %msg) = @_;
00056     
00057     #warn "*** add_message: ", join(", ", map { "$_=>$msg{$_}" } keys %msg), "\n";
00058     
00059     my %safe_msg = $self->_check_fields(%msg);
00060     $safe_msg{to}  = $self->_check_recipients($safe_msg{to})  if defined $safe_msg{to};
00061     $safe_msg{cc}  = $self->_check_recipients($safe_msg{cc})  if defined $safe_msg{cc};
00062     $safe_msg{bcc} = $self->_check_recipients($safe_msg{bcc}) if defined $safe_msg{bcc};
00063     
00064     #warn "*** add_message: ", join(", ", map { "$_=>$safe_msg{$_}" } keys %safe_msg), "\n";
00065     
00066     push @{$$self{msgs}}, \%safe_msg;
00067 }
00068 
00069 sub _check_fields {
00070     my ($self, %msg) = @_;
00071     
00072     my %safe;
00073     foreach my $key (SAFE_MAILMSG_PARAMS) {
00074         $safe{$key} = $msg{$key} if exists $msg{$key};
00075         delete $msg{$key};
00076     }
00077     
00078     if (my @unsafe = keys %msg) {
00079         if (not defined $$self{on_unsafe_arg} or $$self{on_unsafe_arg} eq "croak") {
00080             die "unsafe fields '@unsafe'";
00081         } elsif ($$self{on_unsafe_arg} eq "carp") {
00082             warn "unsafe fields '@unsafe'";
00083         }
00084     }
00085     
00086     return %safe;
00087 }
00088 
00089 sub _check_recipients {
00090     my ($self, $rcpts) = @_;
00091     my @rcpts = ref $rcpts eq "ARRAY" ? @$rcpts : $rcpts;
00092     
00093     my @legal;
00094     foreach my $rcpt (@rcpts) {
00095         my ($base) = $rcpt =~ /<([^<>]*)>\s*$/; # works for addresses generated by Record::User
00096         $base ||= $rcpt; # if it doesn't match, it's a plain address
00097         if (exists $$self{allowed_recipients}{$base}) {
00098             push @legal, $rcpt;
00099         } else {
00100             if (not defined $$self{on_illegal_rcpt} or $$self{on_illegal_rcpt} eq "croak") {
00101                 die "can't address message to illegal recipient '$rcpt'";
00102             } elsif ($$self{on_illegal_rcpt} eq "carp") {
00103                 warn "can't address message to illegal recipient '$rcpt'";
00104             }
00105         }
00106     }
00107     
00108     return @legal;
00109 }
00110 
00111 sub send_messages {
00112     my ($self) = @_;
00113     
00114     #warn "*** send_messages called! there are ", scalar @{$$self{msgs}}, " messages to send.\n";
00115     #return;
00116     return unless @{$$self{msgs}};
00117     
00118     my $mailer = new Mail::Sender {
00119         keepconnection => 1,
00120         skip_bad_recipients => 1,
00121         %{$$self{new_opts}},
00122     };
00123     ref $mailer or die $Mail::Sender::Error;
00124     
00125     my @results;
00126     foreach my $msg (@{$$self{msgs}}) {
00127         push @results, _send_msg($mailer, $msg);
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 # return format:
00132 #   success => true if all succeeded (no need for error reporting)
00133 #   error => Mail::Sender error code
00134 #   error_msg => Mail::Sender error message
00135 #   skipped_recipients => Mail::Sender skipped_recipients hash
00136 sub _send_msg {
00137     my ($mailer, $msg) = @_;
00138     
00139     my %result;
00140     my $ret = $mailer->MailMsg($msg);
00141     if (ref $ret) {
00142         if (defined $mailer->{skipped_recipients}) {
00143             $result{skipped_recipients} = $mailer->{skipped_recipients};
00144         } else {
00145             $result{success} = 1;
00146         }   
00147     } else {
00148         $result{error} = $mailer->{error};
00149         $result{error_msg} = $mailer->{error_msg};
00150     }
00151     
00152     return \%result;
00153 }
00154 
00155 1;
